title: Shen still has no MR gains
body:
Why is that? According to the wiki, he gains no magic resistance because he's able to use ranged attacks.

Meanwhile we have Mundo, Pantheon, Lee Sin, and more who also have ranged attacks have MR gains.

Why does a tank have no MR gains? Same with Singed. For what purpose? While on the subject of Shen, how big is his dash hitbox? Because it feels like that its smaller than the character model itself. Too many times where my model would touch theirs but the taunt isnt applied.

replies.body:
Same with Poppy, Kassadin,  Yasuo and Maokai.

Also, i still believe Elise should get hers back in melee form and to an extent Kayle too.
I understand Kassadin not having one as his passive also gives magic resist. Giving him MR gains would be too much.
Agreed, shen has an especially hard time with laning ap harrasers like vladimir.
It's not like Shen's Q deals a lot of damage and none of the less Shen being one of the slowest split pushers in the game.
